snippet: The Department of Corrections gave Ashley Diamond, a transgender inmate and prison rape victim, what a federal judge refused to grant her in April: a transfer to a medium-security prison.
abstract: Georgia Corrections Dept transfers transgender inmate and prison rape victim Ashley Diamond out of men's maximum-security prison and into medium-security facility; move comes after federal judge had rejected her request for transfer.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Corrections gave Ashley Diamond, a transgender inmate and prison rape victim, what a federal judge refused to grant her in April: a transfer to a medium-security prison.

headline.main: Georgia: Transgender Inmate to Be Transferred
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Transgender Inmate to Be Transferred
